This is how to get the keygen to open:

Right click Microsoft Security Essentials in your tray.
Go to Settings.
Go to Real-time protection.
Uncheck Turn on real-time protection.
Save changes.

Run the keygen.

When you're done turn on real-time protection again.

You can make Fritz 13 use English texts (voice I dunno). Assuming it's in German, do the following:

- After installing, open the application
- Click on the main menu item named "Datei" (File)
- Right at the bottom of the sub menu there is a field labeled "Optionen" (Options)
- If you click on it, a dialog opens
- There is a tab called "Sprache" (Language)
- Use the combo box labeled "Erste Sprache" (First language)
- Select "Englisch"
- Apply changes
